alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Garfield; Prairie; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 4:44PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Wibaux, southeastern Garfield, Prairie and southern Dawson Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 444 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Glendive to 20 miles west of Terry. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glendive, Terry, Wibaux, Fallon, West Glendive, Hoyt, Saint Phillip, Mccloud, Yates, Hodges, Mildred, Calypso, Forest Park and Marsh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
